metadata.description: Spanning multiple decades and continents, this phantasmagorical epic is the unique collaboration between an award-winning American author and the famous French illustrator of Alexandro Jodorowsky's Bouncer series. The  Angoulême) and the Grand Prix surreal story centers on the mysterious Rita, wife of a philandering magician, and her struggles with terrifying demons, both real and imaginary. Winner of the Prix Alfred Sierre). Contains adult material.
metadata.name: The Magician's Wife
